moves.1. d4 d5 2. Nf3 Nf6 3. Bf4 e6: Black wants to proceed along the lines of Queens Gambit Declined
moves.4. e3 Be7 5. Nbd2 c5: White meets any such advance with
moves.6. c3 O-O 7. Bd3 Nc6 8. O-O b6: Black chooses to employ a queenside fianchetto
moves.9. Ne5 Bb7 10. Qf3 Re8 11. Rad1: Black running out of ideas shuffles his pieces around the board

moves.15. Bxh6: great move by white destroying pawn barrier
moves.17... Kxf7 18. Qg6+ Kf8 19. Qxh6+ Kg8 20: This is where black resigned because he didnt want to see
